text: Natural Language Understanding: ChatGPT has been trained on a large corpus of text data, allowing it to understand and interpret natural language inputs from users.

Contextual Understanding: ChatGPT can maintain context and understand the nuances of ongoing conversations. It can remember previous messages and generate responses that are coherent and relevant to the conversation history.
Conversational Flow: It is designed to engage in back-and-forth conversations with users, enabling a more interactive and dynamic interaction compared to single-turn question-answering systems.
